Colorado Department of Human Services
May 27 at 11:13 AM ·

P-EBT is coming to Colorado. This is big news for households with children who receive free or reduced-price lunches, as well as some who have recently become eligible because of COVID-19. P-EBT provides households with an EBT card funded with the value of the free school breakfast and lunch reimbursement rates for the days that schools have been closed in March, April and May, which equals $5.70 per day. Families of approximately 363,000 school-aged children are eligible. Learn more on this FAQ page >> https://bit.ly/346ObyU
